scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && wrangler deploy --env prod
scripts.db:seed:local: npx wrangler d1 execute theslope --file migrations/seed/seed.sql --local
scripts.db:seed: npx wrangler d1 execute theslope --file migrations/seed/seed.sql --remote
scripts.db:migrate:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply theslope --local
scripts.db:migrate: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply theslope --remote
scripts.db_prod:seed:local: npx wrangler d1 execute theslope-prod --file migrations/seed/seed.sql --env prod --local
scripts.db_prod:seed: npx wrangler d1 execute theslope-prod --file migrations/seed/seed.sql --env prod --remote
scripts.db_prod:migrate:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply theslope-prod --env prod  --local
scripts.db_prod:migrate: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply theslope-prod --env prod --remote
